name: fixelfilter
description:
Perform filtering operations on fixel-based data.

If the first input to the command is a specific fixel data file, then a filtered version of only that file will be generated by the command. Alternatively, if the input is the location of a fixel directory, then the command will create a duplicate of the fixel directory, and apply the specified filter operation to all fixel data files within the directory.

References:
author: Robert E. Smith (robert.smith@florey.edu.au)

inputs.name: input
inputs.description: the input: either a fixel data file, or a fixel directory (see Description)

inputs.name: filter
inputs.description: the filtering operation to perform; options are: connect, smooth

inputs.name: output
inputs.description: the output: either a fixel data file, or a fixel directory (see Description)

inputs.name: matrix
inputs.description: provide a fixel-fixel connectivity matrix for filtering operations that require it

inputs.name: threshold_value
inputs.description: specify a threshold for the input fixel data file values (default = 0.5)

inputs.name: threshold_connectivity
inputs.description: specify a fixel-fixel connectivity threshold for connected-component analysis (default = 0.10000000000000001)

inputs.name: fwhm
inputs.description: the full-width half-maximum (FWHM) of the spatial component of the smoothing filter (default = 10mm)

inputs.name: minweight
inputs.description: apply a minimum threshold to smoothing weights (default = 0.01)

inputs.name: mask
inputs.description: only perform smoothing within a specified binary fixel mask

inputs.name: quiet
inputs.description: do not display information messages or progress status; alternatively, this can be achieved by setting the MRTRIX_QUIET environment variable to a non-empty string.

inputs.name: force
inputs.description: force overwrite of output files (caution: using the same file as input and output might cause unexpected behaviour).

inputs.name: nthreads
inputs.description: use this number of threads in multi-threaded applications (set to 0 to disable multi-threading).

inputs.name: config
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

type.name: config
type.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: key
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: value
inputs.description: temporarily set the value of an MRtrix config file entry.

inputs.name: help
inputs.description: display this information page and exit.
